fields.Title: WHIRLING F1 /  MERC TRIBUNAL WARNING
fields.Description: WARNING THE BOYS ABOUT MERC TRIBUNAL

fields.Title: START
input
You: ""I mean, 'Okay, you got one more gu..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I mean, 'Okay, you got one more gun on your side.' Once I find mine. I lost it."

fields.Title: IsKimHere()
IsKimHere()
!(IsKimHere())
Kim Kitsuragi: ""These people are trained military..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "These people are trained military professionals. With decades of combat experience. They're not a gang, or a *Barmy Army*."

fields.Title: You: ""Yes, they are forming some kind of..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Yes, they are forming some kind of  *tribunal* -- and they're coming for you."

fields.Title: You: ""You're the bees; they're the horne..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "You're the bees; they're the hornet."

fields.Title: Jump to: [TRIBUNAL]
Conceptualization: "Terrarium? He's really trying to sa..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Terrarium? He's really trying to salvage something out of it.

fields.Title: Empathy: "Beneath the *whoop-assery* it's cle..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Beneath the *whoop-assery* it's clear that he appreciates all the help he can get.

fields.Title: You: ""I talked to Joyce. The merc you ha..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I talked to Joyce. The merc you hanged -- his friends are coming for you."

fields.Title: You: ""Okay." (Conclude with a shrug.)"
fields.Dialogue Text: "Okay." (Conclude with a shrug.)

fields.Title: You: ""Will they pierce ceramic armour?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Will they pierce ceramic armour?"

fields.Title: You: ""Joyce said they've gone rogue. Nob..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Joyce said they've gone rogue. Nobody is controlling them."

fields.Title: You: ""Well, if Glen has a *nock-cannon*..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Well, if Glen has a *nock-cannon* at home I guess you'll be alright."

fields.Title: Half Light: "*Nervous* snickering. There's a rus..."
fields.Dialogue Text: *Nervous* snickering. There's a rush of adrenaline present.

fields.Title: Titus Hardie: ""Goddamn right it's nothing. The fu..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Goddamn right it's nothing. The fuck are they gonna do? We got ten thousand men in the Union."

fields.Title: Titus Hardie: ""No wonder you cops get shot to shi..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "No wonder you cops get shot to shit every day -- can't go to war with an attitude like *that*."

fields.Title: Jump to: [TRIBUNAL]
IsKimHere()
IsKimHere()
!(IsKimHere())
Kim Kitsuragi: ""All he means is that the situation..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "All he means is that the situation is serious."

fields.Title: IsKimHere()
IsKimHere()
!(IsKimHere())
Encyclopedia: "Evrart said there were two thousand..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Evrart said there were two thousand three hundred and seventy two Union members. But whatever keeps their spirits up.

fields.Title: Glen: ""That thing has seven barrels. One..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "That thing has seven barrels. One trigger. You do the math."

fields.Title: Variable["whirling.hardies_learned_they_listened_to_mercs_radio_comm"]
Variable["whirling.hardies_learned_they_listened_to_mercs_radio_comm"]
!(Variable["whirling.hardies_learned_they_listened_to_mercs_radio_comm"])
Alain: ""Yeah, a well oiled murder-machine!..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Yeah, a well oiled murder-machine!" He punches blondie on the shoulder.

fields.Title: Physical Instrument: "The mood is on the rise. They're fe..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The mood is on the rise. They're feeling confident -- ready to punch out the whole merc platoon.

fields.Title: You: ""I mean 'Okay, you got this' -- you..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I mean 'Okay, you got this' -- you got the numbers."

fields.Title: Jump to: [TRIBUNAL]
Titus Hardie: ""You heard the man -- right here."..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "You heard the man -- right here." He points to the ground. "We're armed, we got the whole district behind us and Glen... Glen is fucking *crazy*."

fields.Title: Jump to: [Hardiehub1]
You: ""I mean, 'Okay, they're going to wi..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I mean, 'Okay, they're going to wipe you the fuck out, Titus.'"

fields.Title: You: ""I mean, 'Okay, I'll be on your sid..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I mean, 'Okay, I'll be on your side when they come.'"

fields.Title: Titus Hardie: ""Yeah, like you've been up against..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Yeah, like you've been up against ceramic armour..." He takes a sip of beer to bide his time, then tries to get the last word in.

fields.Title: You: ""The mercenaries are armed with aut..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "The mercenaries are armed with automatic weapons."

fields.Title: Eugene: ""Wouldn't wanna beat up his grandma..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Wouldn't wanna beat up his grandma." There's snickering in the room. Some of the men put their beers down.

fields.Title: Titus Hardie: ""Goddamn right it's nothing. This i..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Goddamn right it's nothing. This isn't a fucking terrarium. This is Martinaise."

fields.Title: Titus Hardie: ""What do you mean *okay*?" He jerks..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "What do you mean *okay*?" He jerks forward a bit.

fields.Title: Titus Hardie: ""We don't need you or your lost gun..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "We don't need you or your lost gun. We all *have* our guns." He almost splashes his beer at you. "We'll just use those if it's okay with you."

fields.Title: Titus Hardie: ""Funny. Don't get hit by a stray bu..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Funny. Don't get hit by a stray bullet."

fields.Title: You: ""See what? That they don't?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "See what? That they don't?"

fields.Title: Variable["cargo.evrart_2372_union_members"]
Variable["cargo.evrart_2372_union_members"]
!(Variable["cargo.evrart_2372_union_members"])
Titus Hardie: ""Easy, E, he's tryna' faze you." He..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Easy, E, he's tryna' faze you." He turns to you. "What are you trying to do? Scare my men?"

fields.Title: IsKimHere()
IsKimHere()
!(IsKimHere())
Authority: "He really doesn't like you ruffling..."
fields.Dialogue Text: He really doesn't like you ruffling their feathers like that -- on what might be the eve of battle.

fields.Title: IsKimHere()
IsKimHere()
!(IsKimHere())
Hand/Eye Coordination: "So that's *one* dead and a looooong..."
fields.Dialogue Text: So that's *one* dead and a looooong reload. But whatever.

fields.Title: Titus Hardie: ""You haven't even seen the whole su..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "You haven't even seen the whole suit, right? I've seen the whole fucking thing and it didn't make him immortal."

fields.Title: Half Light: "He's really prepped himself up for..."
fields.Dialogue Text: He's really prepped himself up for this. He has to. To keep the fear in check.

fields.Title: You: ""Forget I mentioned it, it was prob..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Forget I mentioned it, it was probably nothing."

fields.Title: Eugene: ""We're not bees, we're men. We're s..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "We're not bees, we're men. We're socialists!"

fields.Title: Titus Hardie: ""I guess we're gonna see, aren't we?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "I guess we're gonna see, aren't we?"

fields.Title: You: ""Nothing.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Nothing."

fields.Title: Variable["whirling.hardies_the_boys_know_merc_was_oranjese_special_forces"] == true
Variable["whirling.hardies_the_boys_know_merc_was_oranjese_special_forces"] == true
!(Variable["whirling.hardies_the_boys_know_merc_was_oranjese_special_forces"] == true)
Glen: ""Let them come!" Blondie yells acro..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Let them come!" Blondie yells across the cafeteria. "The Hardie boys are right fucking here!"

fields.Title: Titus Hardie: ""Goddamn right we do." He nods. "We..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Goddamn right we do." He nods. "We've done it before. Ain't that right, fellas?!"

fields.Title: Jump to: [Hardiehub1]
Rhetoric: "I think he meant a *can* of whoop-a..."
fields.Dialogue Text: I think he meant a *can* of whoop-ass?

fields.Title: Titus Hardie: ""No, they won't." He shakes his bee..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "No, they won't." He shakes his beer at you. "Get out of here with your negative energy."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""These people are trained military..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "These people are trained military professionals. Special forces, as you said. They're not a gang, or a *Barmy Army*."

fields.Title: Titus Hardie: ""No, they're not. They're un-coordi..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "No, they're not. They're un-coordinated and drunk. Don't forget: we're listening in on their communications. Their shit is *way* apart."

fields.Title: You: ""Do you know that a single Seraise..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Do you know that a single Seraise Giant Hornet can kill forty bees a *minute*?"

fields.Title: Titus Hardie: ""Yeah..." he snorts. "Just try not..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Yeah..." he snorts. "Just try not to get in the way -- when the whoop-ass flies open!"

fields.Title: Titus Hardie: ""Right about what?" He looks at you..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Right about what?" He looks at you defiantly. "That a 50 calibre bullet goes through shit? Yeah. I am."

fields.Title: Glen: ""Fuck yeah we have! Battle-hardened..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Fuck yeah we have! Battle-hardened urban soldiers, man. We got the guns *and* the reserves."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Lost gun or not, you're going to n..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Lost gun or not, you're going to need help." The lieutenant looks Titus in the eye. "We're offering it."

fields.Title: Titus Hardie: ""Okay, I accept the offer." The man..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Okay, I accept the offer." The man cracks his shoulder. "But I'll believe it when I see it."

fields.Title: Titus Hardie: ""No, they're not. They're un-coordi..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "No, they're not. They're un-coordinated and drunk. We know more about them than you think."

fields.Title: Jump to: [Hardiehub1]
Titus Hardie: ""We got weapons of our own." He cra..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "We got weapons of our own." He cracks open his vest to give you a glimpse of his holster. "We got Ister 50s, Zielegers, Glen's got a nock-cannon at home..."

fields.Title: Titus Hardie: ""Pft!" A spray of beer. "So were th..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Pft!" A spray of beer. "So were the local gangs. The fuckin' *Barmy Army* and the Madre scum. You've been out there. Seen any around?"

fields.Title: Shanky: ""Yeah... we got reserves." He nods..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Yeah... we got reserves." He nods nervously. "We can call in reinforcements."

fields.Title: Titus Hardie: ""Yeah?" He doesn't seem worried. "B..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Yeah?" He doesn't seem worried. "By friends you mean his squadmates from Krenel?"

fields.Title: TRIBUNAL
You: ""This Krenel is bad news. You know..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "This Krenel is bad news. You know that, right?"

fields.Title: Encyclopedia: "It's probably more like two or thre..."
fields.Dialogue Text: It's probably more like two or three thousand. But whatever keeps their spirits up.

fields.Title: Rhetoric: "That was an unsure phrasing."
fields.Dialogue Text: That was an unsure phrasing.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""This is what happens if you take t..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "This is what happens if you take the law into your own hands. Other people start doing it too."

fields.Title: Empathy: "Titus did his best, but his men are..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Titus did his best, but his men are a bit unsettled.

fields.Title: You: ""I mean, 'Okay, I guess I'll be gun..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I mean, 'Okay, I guess I'll be gunning you down right alongside them.'"

fields.Title: Empathy: "He appreciates it, but can only acc..."
fields.Dialogue Text: He appreciates it, but can only accept it *conditionally*.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""No he won't." The lieutenant adjus..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "No he won't." The lieutenant adjusts his glasses. "This is probably some kind of a joke."

fields.Title: Authority: "This guy will be the first one to b..."
fields.Dialogue Text: This guy will be the first one to bail.

fields.Title: Jump to: [TRIBUNAL]
Titus Hardie: ""Big fucking surprise..." He mutter..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Big fucking surprise..." He mutters. "They hire psycho scum, arm them to the teeth and let them loose in the city. What do you think is gonna happen?"

fields.Title: Titus Hardie: ""... the fuck is that supposed to m..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "... the fuck is that supposed to mean?"

fields.Title: Alain: ""Yeah? Where are they now, huh?" He..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Yeah? Where are they now, huh?" He points South. "Sent back to Madre in an airtight cargo crate."

fields.Title: You: ""For your sake I hope you're right.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "For your sake I hope you're right."
